pages.title: Kamen Rider Gazer Zero
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Geats Extra: Kamen Rider Gazer (2024, TTFC special)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/zillion_driver#zillion_driver_gazer_zero)Zillion Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Radar IV$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste IV$(li)Strength VI
